medical_report: Frank Cooper, a 73-year-old male, presents with tremors in both hands at rest, slowed movements, and shuffling gait developing over past year. Symptoms affect daily activities. Neurological examination reveals cogwheel rigidity. Started on Levodopa/Carbidopa 25/100mg three times daily.

Helen Zhang, a 34-year-old female, presents with recurring episodes of dizziness, vertigo, and tinnitus lasting several hours. Reports fullness in right ear. Audiometry shows low-frequency hearing loss. Started on Meclizine 25mg as needed for vertigo episodes.

Bradley Scott, a 44-year-old male, presents with persistent dry, scaly patches with silvery scales on elbows and knees. Symptoms worse with stress. Family history positive for autoimmune conditions. Started on Methotrexate 15mg weekly.

Victoria Patel, a 27-year-old female, presents with chronic fatigue, muscle pain, and tender points throughout body. Reports unrefreshing sleep and cognitive difficulties. Started on Duloxetine 30mg daily with gradual increase to 60mg.

Gregory Barnes, a 59-year-old male, presents with numbness and tingling in both feet progressing over 6 months. Lab work reveals HbA1c of 8.9%. Started on Metformin 500mg twice daily with lifestyle modification counseling.

Sophia Rivera, a 36-year-old female, presents with recurrent abdominal pain and bloody diarrhea for 3 months. Colonoscopy reveals inflammation and ulceration in descending colon. Started on Mesalamine 2.4g daily.

Arthur Coleman, a 67-year-old male, presents with gradually decreasing visual acuity and glare sensitivity. Slit lamp examination reveals nuclear sclerosis. Started on Timolol 0.5% eye drops twice daily to reduce intraocular pressure.

Nina Walsh, a 42-year-old female, presents with sudden onset of severe right upper quadrant pain after fatty meals. Ultrasound shows multiple gallstones. Started on Ursodiol 300mg twice daily while awaiting surgery.

Trevor Phillips, a 51-year-old male, presents with persistent joint pain and tophi in fingers. Serum uric acid 9.2 mg/dL. Started on Allopurinol 100mg daily with gradual increase based on uric acid levels.

Carmen Rodriguez, a 31-year-old female, presents with palpitations, heat intolerance, and unexplained weight loss. TSH suppressed, elevated T4. Thyroid scan suggests Graves' disease. Started on Methimazole 10mg twice daily.
